name: Gridle (Notan)
description:
Guess the Gridle in 6 tries.
Each guess must be a polyomino tiling of a 4x4 grid.
After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the answer.

Inspired by Wordle and Nerdle
If you liked this game, you might also enjoy zaratustra's Cram Sessions.
